import React from 'react' import { Route, Switch, Redirect, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import App from './App' import Header from './Header' import Login from './Login' import Register from './Register' import ProtectedRoute from './ProtectedRoute' import * as auth from './Auth'; function MegaRouter() { const [loggedIn, setLoggedIn] = React.useState(false) const [userData, setUserData] = React.useState({ identifier: '', password: '' }); function handleLoginClick(identifier, password) { /* функция при нажатие на кнопку */ //e.preventDefault() console.log(' -_-_- > ', identifier, password) auth.authorize(identifier, password) .then(obj => { console.log('mr -_- > ', obj) }) .catch( err => console.log(' er er -> ', err)) } return ( <>
{loggedIn ? : } ) } /*
*/ export default MegaRouter
